This week, the show wrapped filming for its third season, and Apple TV+’s Instagram account shared the video of a very emotional Harrison Ford thanking the crew, and hoping for another round. ‘The very, very best’ In the past, Ford has spoken about how, since Shrinking first aired, people have stopped hunting him down the street for pictures, and instead tend to ask him how he’s been. That reflects the show’s overarching theme, which, as the name suggests, deals with mental health, kindness, and the challenges of human relationships. In Shrinking, Ford plays a grumpy therapist called Paul Rhodes, who has Parkinson’s. And since it has already been announced that Michael J. Fox will make a guest appearance during the third season, this suggests that Parkinson’s will play a bigger role this time around. html:
Last week, Shrinking landed seven Emmy nominations, including Harrison Ford’s first, for his role as the curmudgeonly Paul Rhodes. This week, the show wrapped filming for its third season, and Apple TV+’s Instagram account shared the video of a very emotional Harrison Ford thanking the crew, and hoping for another round.

‘The very, very best’

In the past, Ford has spoken about how, since Shrinking first aired, people have stopped hunting him down the street for pictures, and instead tend to ask him how he’s been.

That reflects the show’s overarching theme, which, as the name suggests, deals with mental health, kindness, and the challenges of human relationships.

In Shrinking, Ford plays a grumpy therapist called Paul Rhodes, who has Parkinson’s. And since it has already been announced that Michael J. Fox will make a guest appearance during the third season, this suggests that Parkinson’s will play a bigger role this time around.

While Apple hasn’t yet confirmed the premiere date for season 3, the Apple TV+ Instagram account recently published a video that seems to immediately follow the filming of the last scene of the season. In it, a visibly overwhelmed Ford thanks the crew, before jokingly snapping at co-star Jason Segel (How I Met Your Mother).
